message:
Jobs: Quality Control Engineer 2 years Experience

Diagnosoft for Healthcare  (www.diagnosoft.com) is now hiring a Quality Control Engineer with the following specs:
B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Computer Science or Engineering.
Minimum 2 years experience  in testing Client server applications, web services and desktop-based systems.
Experience with MS SQL databases and MS SQL scripting.
Experience with all phases of software testing (Functional,  Integration, Regression, and User Acceptance).
In-depth knowledge of test case creation and test case execution.
Solid knowledge with software technologies including: HTML, XML, C++, and .NET.
Knowledge of Team Foundation Server (TFS) is a plus..
Knowledge of Agile development life lifecycles.
ISTQB Certificate is a plus
 
Please send your resume to suha.maarouf@diagnosoft.com and write (QCTY) in the subject line of the email
